title: Remove landing page elements shown in screenshot

requirements.text: Update the landing page (frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx) to remove the UI elements shown in the provided screenshot: remove the marketing tagline text "Streamline your financial operations with our comprehensive management platform" and remove the entire "Admin Portal" card (icon, title, description, and "Access Admin Portal" button/link).

quotes: Remove  things which present in the screenshot

acceptanceCriteria: The landing page no longer renders the paragraph text "Streamline your financial operations with our comprehensive management platform".
The landing page no longer renders an "Admin Portal" card or an "Access Admin Portal" button.
The landing page still renders without layout breakage; remaining content is centered and looks intentional (e.g., the grid is adjusted to a single card layout).
No unused imports or dead code remain in LandingPage.tsx (e.g., admin icon import/click handler removed if no longer used).

constraints: Use English for any user-facing text.
Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (compose existing components instead).
Backend is single-actor; no backend changes are required for this request.
nonGoals: Changing any admin/customer portal functionality beyond removing the landing-page entry points requested.
Modifying authentication/session logic or backend data structures.
